sourceMeaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>yellow</radical> and the kanji <kanji>yellow</kanji> are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: You're in a room, surrounded completely by <kanji>yellow</kanji>. You can't get out. Somewhere in the room is a yellow <reading>key</reading> (<ja>き</ja>) but you can't find it, because everything looks the same. You crawl around trying to find this tiny thing so that you can escape.
readingInfo: The walls are coming in closer, too. Make sure you feel a bit of peril as you look for this key. The walls have a slight opening at the bottom too, so if you don't find it before the wall goes over it, the key will be lost forever, and you'll be smushed!
